resources.string: Detect number of faces in an image
Clear all uploaded photos on server

There are also two labels of faces in the sample photos.\n In order to try our Superface\'s Face Labeling API with our provided sample photo, please take a photo on our provided sample photo. (It is stored "./data/face_label_test_data/test_img.jpg" where "./" means the root folder of our Superface project)\n Please be notified that executing sample photos\' Face Labeling progress will delete all photos you have previously uploaded through our App. (i.e. the s1 and s2 labels\' photos)

Hello, welcome to our Superface's Face Labeling API demo page.
 In order to let you smoothly test out our API, we have limited the labels you can choose to amount of 2. When you are actually using our API, there is limit on the amount of labels.
 For more information about the API, please redirect to the documentation of our Superface API.
 For more information about testing our Face Labeling using sample photos, please choose predict "with sample photos" and then a dialog will appear with more information.
 Please be notified that every time you restart the Demo App or reenter this page will not clear the photos on the server, but will clear the photos' counter on the local side. For better experience, please clear all uploaded photos on server and reupload every time you reopen the App or reenter the page.
